features: Multifunctional Bookshelf: Armocity industrial bookshelf provides unique decoration for your home or office. It is suitable for multiple scenes, living room, bedroom, study room, kitchen, entryway; Can be used as a bookcase, kitchen rack, bathroom shelf, office book shelves. You can explore more ways to use it.
Large Storage Space: 5-Tier bookshelf provides enough space to display and store your favorite items, books, family photo, CDs, and plants. Make your space more elegant and tidy.

Sturdy for Safe Use: The book case is composed of a high-quality wooden board and sturdy frame to provide stability. The capacity of each tier allows you to store more items. Adjustable foot pads can keep stable and protect the ground from scratches.
Easy to Install: Come with comprehensible detailed instructions and labeled parts to help you install the white bookshelf easier without taking a long time.

After-sales service: We provide 24 months customer support for our products. If you have any problem with our white bookcases, please feel free to contact us, our friendly customer service team will always here for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shelf for the price
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Took a little time but not difficult. Looks nice and seems to be very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful! So easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: This actually exceeded my expectations! I bought two in the woodgrain color. The design, quality and overall appearance is beautiful! Plus the great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I took my time putting this bookshelf together and the instructions were clear and easy to follow. Once finished it’s a very nice and sturdy piece of furniture. I put it in my bedroom to display my Christmas decor and it fit great in the small place I needed it for. The shelves are also very versatile, I didn’t utilize all of them and it still looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice but will not assemble properly - UPDATED
reviews.reviewText: After trying to get it to assemble properly for an hour and a half, I’ve given up. The metal pieces that are supposed to join the sides together do not properly fit and will not work. It is a cute small space shelf but the hardware does not properly fit and it will not join the metal sides together in a way that will create stability. So frustrating and annoying because now I would like to send it back but it’s halfway assembled. I just want my money back.UPDATED: Customer service was able to provide replacement parts and I was finally able to complete the assembly. Now the shelves are strong and stable. Nice looking too. A tip: If part #7 will not fit inside the side/leg opening, use a hammer on part #7 and close the U shape in just slightly then the part will work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf is exactly what I was looking for, and just as expected and described. I was able to put it together by myself, very simple build. It's sturdy and I really love the unique look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and simple to put together
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I put this together in under an hour to help organize his office, it was an easy build (I definitely could have done it myself), it looks great in the space, and he loves how it has helped the room come together. It’s probably a foot taller than I am, and the adjustable feet definitely help bring stability to it. Highly recommend using the wall mounts because it’s a bit lighter and less sturdy than I expected but it does exactly what I bought it for. Overall, very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: It's a good looking shelving unit, easy to put together and surprisingly sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to put together. Instructions were clear and everything was provided for assembly. It is sturdy once it is put together and looks great against the white walls and other gray furniture in the room. I already have books and pictures on it and with how the center dividers are not in the middle but switch their is no bending of the shelves due to book weight. I love it!
